name: Naganadel GX
author: PLANETA Tsuji

abilities.name: Ultra Conversion
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard an Ultra Beast card from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Venom Shot
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 170 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Injection GX
attacks.effect: Add a card from your opponent’s discard pile to their Prize cards face down. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
